Title: Creates a sustainable development task force to study the feasibility of adopting a regulatory system to achieve the goal of sustainable development
Summary: Creates a fifteen member sustainable development task force to study the feasibility of adopting a goal oriented and performance based regulatory system to achieve the goal of sustainable development in the state; sets forth certain goals and makes provision for organization of the task force.
ActClause: AN ACT creating a sustainable development task force to study the feasibility of adopting goal oriented and performance based regulatory systems to achieve a goal of sustainable development for the state of New York
